name: Save the Ckickens
description:
Get to the end of each journey with as many chickens as possible in your truck.

- Great B.S.

- Nice graphics.

- Easy and intuitive control.

- Playable on any device.

- Funny, very funny.

Controls:

- Keyboard, use the up and down arrows to accelerate and slow down.

- Touch screen, touch on the right side to accelerate, left to brake.
